Title: Shadows in the Glass
Writer: Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Everett (based on the Marvel comics by), Drew Goddard (created by), Steven S. DeKnight, Luke Kalteux (story editor), Christos N. Gage (staff writer), Ruth Fletcher (staff writer)
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Toby Leonard Moore
Plot: While Murdock, Foggy and Karen's mission becomes clearer, Fisk's world spins further out of control in his battle for Hell's Kitchen.
